abilityEffect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), if Elekid is anywhere under Electivire, you may move a [L] Energy attached to your Pok√©mon to Electivire. This power can't be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may discard all [L] Energy attached to Electivire. If you do, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 60.
